result.title: Report on Side Event at Arctic Council SAO meeting with AC WGs and PPs (T7.2).
result.description: A briefing will be organized as a side event at meetings of AC Senior Arctic Officials for Chairs and Executive Secretaries of the six AC Working Groups as well as representatives of the PPs on the outcomes of Arctic PASSION work. The topics will be selected based on priority issues in the Arctic Council, particularly those under the AC chairmanship

result.title: Reports on WMO GTS datasets made available for non-GTS connected users and on new datasets ingested into WMO GTS based on user requirements (T1.2)
result.description: WMO is exchanging information for operational purposes globally through a private network called WMO Global Telecommunication System (GTS). Information on free and open data extracted from this system and made available for the scientific community (access point in WP2), will be documented as a contribution from the community to the global efforts of WMO.

result.title: MeteoIO docker image and OGC WPS service (T2.3)
result.description: A software component that will be used to offer self-help-service todata providers generating FAIR meteorological, oceanographical andglaciological data. This is developed for usage in D2.3, but will beoffered to anyone that would like to set up such a service.

result.title: Report of Briefing Meeting to inform MEPs and European Officials on Arctic topics of emerging priority (T7.3)
result.description: A policy briefing will be organised for MEPs and European officials on topics of emerging priority, relevant to Arctic PASSION’s work and in line the European Arctic policy. Topics will be set in communication with policymakers and our Advisory Panel, and the interactive briefing (held either in person or online) will include opportunity for prior input and follow-up
